metadata.title: CVE-2021-47335 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: f2fs:fix to avoid racing on fsync_entry_slab by multi filesystem instances Assyzbot reported, there is an use-after-free issue during f2fs recovery:Use-after-free write at 0xffff88823bc16040 (in kfence-#10):kmem_cache_destroy+0x1f/0x120 mm/slab_common.c:486f2fs_recover_fsync_data+0x75b0/0x8380 fs/f2fs/recovery.c:869f2fs_fill_super+0x9393/0xa420 fs/f2fs/super.c:3945 mount_bdev+0x26c/0x3a0fs/super.c:1367 legacy_get_tree+0xea/0x180 fs/fs_context.c:592vfs_get_tree+0x86/0x270 fs/super.c:1497 do_new_mount fs/namespace.c:2905[inline] path_mount+0x196f/0x2be0 fs/namespace.c:3235 do_mountfs/namespace.c:3248 [inline] __do_sys_mount fs/namespace.c:3456 [inline]__se_sys_mount+0x2f9/0x3b0 fs/namespace.c:3433 do_syscall_64+0x3f/0xb0arch/x86/entry/common.c:47 entry_SYSCALL_64_after_hwframe+0x44/0xae Theroot cause is multi f2fs filesystem instances can race on accessing globalfsync_entry_slab pointer, result in use-after-free issue of slab cache,fixes to init/destroy this slab cache only once during module init/destroyprocedure to avoid this issue.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-47335` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-5.15.0-33-generic - 5.15.0-33.34~20.04.1
linux-image-5.15.0-33-generic-lpae - 5.15.0-33.34~20.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-33-generic - 5.15.0-33.34~20.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-33-generic-64k - 5.15.0-33.34~20.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1014-aws - 5.15.0-1014.18~20.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1007-azure - 5.15.0-1007.8~20.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1019-azure-fde - 5.15.0-1019.24~20.04.1.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1006-gcp - 5.15.0-1006.9~20.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1003-gkeop - 5.15.0-1003.5~20.04.2
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1033-ibm - 5.15.0-1033.36~20.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1003-intel-iotg - 5.15.0-1003.5~20.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-33-lowlatency - 5.15.0-33.34~20.04.1

No subscription required

No subscription required
